name: L.A. Noire

task.description: Hold tight while we install some winetricks
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  appid: 110800
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_42 d3dx9_43 vcrun2008 dotnet35sp1 win7
    arch: win32
    description: Hold tight while we install some winetricks
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3rd/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /Silent
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3rd/Social Club Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/3rd/Social Club Setup.exe
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/3rd
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/3rd"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/3rd/
    src: $GAMEDIR/Social Club Setup.exe
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/Rockstar Games/L.A. Noire/settings.ini
    key: Renderer
    section: LANSettings
    value: DirectX 11
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
